title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.77 - Mobile equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.77 - Mobile equipment

State Regulations

All mobile equipment not required to be equipped with
lighted lamps, when traversing a terminal highway or other highways where
vehicles are permitted to operate, shall be escorted by a following vehicle. The vehicle following the unlighted equipment shall be required to direct its
lights on the equipment being escorted. In this manner, the unlighted equipment
will be more visible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.77

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
